---
title: "Operaciones Matemáticas"
author: "Richard Pardes-Espinosa"
data: "2024-07-01"
format: html
editor: visual
editor_options: 
  chunk_output_type: console
toc: true
number-sections: true
code-fold: show
code-summary: "ver código"
---



En el entorno de Rstudio, el usuario podría realizar algunas operaciones matemáticas, como suma, resta, mutiplicación, división, potenciación, entre otros. A continuación, se presenta algunos ejemplos:


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
# Suma
1 + 7
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] 8
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# Resta
10 - 3
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] 7
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# Multiplicación
2*3
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] 6
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# División
25/5
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] 5
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# Potenciación
45**3
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] 91125
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
45^3
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] 91125
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# Raíz
sqrt(16)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] 4
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# Logaritmo
log10(100)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] 2
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
log(100)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] 4.60517
```


:::
:::
